About

I'm Adeoluwa a Lagos-based web developer skilled in front-end and back-end development. I specialize in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Go, Python, and MySQL. I create dynamic web applications using React, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap.

With clean code and Git for version control, collaboration is seamless. I stay updated with the latest web development trends for innovative ideas.

Looking for a dedicated web developer? Let's collaborate! Check my projects for example. Contact me with any questions or project discussions.

Thank you for visiting my profile, and I look forward to collaborating with you! Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to discuss a project.
